prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What concrete incident or experience in Stefan's history is the root cause of his current behavior regarding his children's health claims?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
I will now enumerate the key chart data using horary principles for your query, detailed step by step:

1. Planetary Positions (with orbital details noted):
 • Sun: 15°25′ Aquarius
 • Moon: 27°56′ Aries
 • Mercury: 11°26′ Aquarius
 • Venus: 29°45′ Pisces
 • Mars: 19°37′ Cancer (retrograde)
 • Jupiter: 11°16′ Gemini (retrograde)
 • Saturn: 17°45′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23°16′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28°03′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2°08′ Aquarius
 • North Node: 29°41′ Pisces (retrograde)
 • Chiron: 19°35′ Aries

2. Essential Angles and House Cusps:
 • Ascendant: 0°40′ Virgo (represents you, Melissa)
 • Midheaven (MC): 24°37′ Taurus
 • Imum Coeli (IC): 24°37′ Scorpio

3. House Structure of the Horary Chart:
 • 1st House: starting at 0° Virgo
 • 2nd House: starting at 23° Virgo
 • 3rd House: starting at 20° Libra
 • 4th House: starting at 24° Scorpio
 • 5th House: starting at 3° Capricorn (contains Pluto)
 • 6th House: starting at 5° Aquarius (contains Sun and Mercury)
 • 7th House: starting at 0° Pisces (contains Saturn)
 • 8th House: starting at 23° Pisces (contains Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron)
 • 9th House: starting at 20° Aries (contains Moon and Uranus)
 • 10th House: starting at 24° Taurus (contains Jupiter)
 • 11th House: starting at 3° Cancer (contains Mars)
 • 12th House: starting at 5° Leo

4. Relevant Aspects (primary aspects with tight orb noted):
 • Mars square Chiron (orb: 0°)
 • MC opposition IC (orb: 0°)
 • Venus conjunct North Node (orb: 0°)
 • Mercury trine Jupiter (orb: 0°)
 • Uranus opposition IC (orb: 1°)
 • Neptune conjunct North Node (orb: 1°)
 • Uranus conjunct MC (orb: 1°)
 • Venus conjunct Neptune (orb: 1°)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • Pluto sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Venus sextile Pluto (orb: 3°)
 • Moon trine Ascendant (orb: 3°)
 • Neptune sextile MC (orb: 4°)
 • Mars sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
 • Sun sextile Chiron (orb: 4°)
 • Sun conjunct Mercury (orb: 4°)
 • Neptune trine IC (orb: 4°)
 • Sun trine Jupiter (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Mars sextile MC (orb: 5°)
 • Venus sextile MC (orb: 5°)
 • Moon square Pluto (orb: 5°)
 • Mars trine IC (orb: 5°)
 • Venus trine IC (orb: 5°)
 • Saturn sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Venus sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Ascendant square IC (orb: 6°)
 • Ascendant square MC (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter square Saturn (orb: 6°)
 • Uranus square Ascendant (orb: 7°)
 • Saturn trine IC (orb: 7°)
 • Moon conjunct Chiron (orb: 8°)
 • Pluto trine MC (orb: 8°)

5. Notable Patterns and Configurations:
 • Grand Trine: Involving Mars (Cancer), IC (Scorpio), and Saturn (Pisces)
 • Kite: Built on the Grand Trine, adding Uranus (Taurus)
 • T-Square: Formed between MC (Taurus), Ascendant (Virgo), and IC (Scorpio) with Uranus (Taurus) as the focal disruption
 • Yod: With vertices at Ascendant (Virgo), North Node (Pisces), Pluto (Aquarius), and Venus (Pisces)

6. Special Conditions:
 • The Moon is in the waxing crescent phase
 • Bowl shape chart configuration with predominance in the top right quadrant
 • Retrograde motion observed in Mars, Jupiter, and the North Node
 • Mutual reception noted between Moon (in Aries) and Mars (in Cancer)
 • Neptune operating in its rulership in Pisces

7. House Cross-Reference for Stefan:
 Using your provided guide, Stefan’s representation aligns as follows:
  – Chart’s 9th House (starting at 20° Aries, containing Moon and Uranus) corresponds to Stefan’s 12th House in his native mapping.

All these elements are available from the horary chart data. This complete list should serve as a firm foundation for the subsequent interpretation focusing on the incident in Stefan’s past relevant to his current behavior concerning his children’s health claims.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
The horary configuration points to a past episode in Stefan’s life marked by intense, disruptive energy. The 9th house, representing him, contains the Moon in Aries and Uranus in Taurus. The Moon’s placement in Aries indicates a burst of raw, impulsive emotion connected to a sudden experience, while Uranus underscores an unexpected, jarring event—something out of the ordinary that shattered his emotional stability. The square between Mars and Chiron further emphasizes that this event inflicted a deep wound; the sharp, militant energy of Mars clashing with the ache of Chiron suggests that it was both traumatic and formative.

In addition, the challenging aspect of the Moon square Pluto points toward a hidden, transformative crisis—one that involved a power imbalance or betrayal. Combined with the involvement of Uranus opposing the lower sector (IC) and reinforcing the feeling of estrangement from familiar, secure environments, the evidence suggests that the incident occurred in a context that was foreign or institutional in nature. Stefan’s past may include a significant health crisis or a traumatic encounter with a medical or authoritative figure while in an unfamiliar setting. This unresolved wound appears to have anchored his current behavior, leading him to overreact and assert control regarding his children’s health claims.

Based solely on these elements, the chart indicates that Stefan’s current behavior is rooted in a specific, disruptive incident in his past—an unexpected, deeply painful experience in a foreign or institutional context that left him with enduring emotional scars.
